rukus.text: 18|1|sab prashansa us allaah ke lie hai, jisane apane bhakt par ye pustak utaaree aur usamen koee tedhee baat nahin rakhee.
18|2|ati seedhee (pustak), taaki vah apane paas kee kadee yaatana se saavadhaan kar de aur eemaan vaalon ko jo sadaachaar karate hon, shubh soochana suna de ki unheen ke lie achchha badala hai.
18|4|aur unhen saavadhaan kare, jinhonne kaha ki allaah ne apane lie koee santaan bana lee hai.
18|5|unhen isaka kuchh gyaan hai aur na unake poorvajon ko. bahut badee baat hai, jo unake mukhon se nikal rahee hai, ve saraasar jhooth hee bol rahe hain.
18|6|to sambhavatah aap isake peechhe apana praan kho denge, santaap ke kaaran, yadi ve is haî€¼dees (quraan) par eemaan na laayen.
18|7|vaastav mein, jo kuchh dharatee ke oopar hai, use hamane usake lie shobha banaaya hai, taaki unakee pareeksha len ki unamen kaun karm mein sabase achchha hai
18|8|aur nishchay ham kar dene[1] vaale hain, jo us (dharatee) ke oopar hai, use (banjar) dhool.
18|9|(he nabee!) kya aapane samajha hai ki gupha tatha shila lekh vaale[1], hamaare adbhut lakshanon (nishaaniyon) mein se the
18|10|jab navayuvakon ne gupha kee or sharan lee[1] aur praarthana keeh he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen apanee vishesh daya pradaan kar aur hamaare lie prabandh kar de hamaare vishay ke sudhaar ka.
18|11|to hamane unhen gupha mein sula diya kaee varshon tak.
18|12|phir hamane unhen jaga diya, taaki ham ye jaan len ki do samudaayon mein se kisane unake thahare rahane kee avadhi ko adhik yaad rakha hai
